snippet: Abraham H. Foxman was at the center of many controversies involving Israel and the Jewish community in recent years.
abstract: Abraham H Foxman, Holocaust survivor whose 50-year tenure battling anti-Semitism made him one of the visible and influential leaders of the American Jewish community, announces that he will retire in 2015 as national director of the Anti-Defamation League.
lead_paragraph: Abraham H. Foxman was at the center of many controversies involving Israel and the Jewish community in recent years.

headline.main: Anti-Defamation League’s Director to Retire After Leading Group for 27 Years
